imdb.plot outline: Supernatural detective series following Michael, whom since losing his girlfriend in tragic circumstances, now has the unwanted 'gift' of communication with the dead and travels around Europe piecing together unfinished business of the recently departed.
imdb.title: Echo Road
plot: Supernatural detective series following Michael, whom since losing his girlfriend in tragic circumstances, now has the unwanted 'gift' of communication with the dead and travels around Europe piecing together unfinished business of the recently departed.::Howard J Ford
